tosca_definitions_version: tosca_simple_yaml_1_0_0_wd03
description: WebChat application
imports:
- tosca-normative-types:1.0.0.wd03-SNAPSHOT
topology_template:
  node_templates:
    WebChat-Module:
      type: seaclouds.nodes.webapp.tomcat.TomcatServer
      artifacts:
      - war: "http://search.maven.org/remotecontent?filepath=io/brooklyn/example/brooklyn-example-hello-world-sql-webapp/0.6.0/brooklyn-example-hello-world-sql-webapp-0.6.0.war"
        type: tosca.artifacts.File
      requirements:
      - endpoint: MessageDatabase
      - host: webservice_offering


    MessageDatabase:
      type: seaclouds.nodes.database.mysql.MySqlNode
      artifacts:
      - db_create: https://bit.ly/brooklyn-visitors-creation-script
        type: tosca.artifacts.File
      properties:
        mysql_version:
          constraints:
          - greater_or_equal: '5.0'
          - less_or_equal: '5.0'
      requirements:
      - host: My-DB-Compute

    MessageDatabase-Compute:
      type: seaclouds.nodes.Platform.Pivotal
      properties:
        resource_type: platform
        go_support: true
        java_support: true
        node_support: true
        php_support: true
        python_support: true
        ruby_support: true
        mysql_support: true
        postgresql_support: true
        mongoDB_support: true
        redis_support: true
        riak_support: true
        dataStax_support: true
        neo4j_support: true
        pivotalHD_support: true
        cost: 0.03 USD_perGB_per_h
        java_version: 7

    webservice_offering:
      type: seaclouds.nodes.Platform.Pivotal
      properties:
        resource_type: platform
        go_support: true
        java_support: true
        node_support: true
        php_support: true
        python_support: true
        ruby_support: true
        mysql_support: true
        postgresql_support: true
        mongoDB_support: true
        redis_support: true
        riak_support: true
        dataStax_support: true
        neo4j_support: true
        pivotalHD_support: true
        cost: 0.03 USD_perGB_per_h
        java_version: 7


groups:
  operation_Chat:
    members:
    - WebChat-Module
    policies:
    - QoSInfo:
        execution_time: 50 ms
        benchmark_platform: hp_cloud_services.2xl
    - dependencies:
        operation_MessageDatabase: '2'
    - QoSRequirements:
        response_time:
          less_than: 2000.0 ms
        availability:
          greater_than: 0.998
        cost:
          less_or_equal: 200.0 euros_per_month
        workload:
          less_or_equal: 50.0 req_per_min
      - ExpectedQuality: {expectedWorkload: 50.0, expectedAvailability: 0.9994997551225, expectedCost: 190.8, expectedExecutionTime: 0.10079721294968995}

  operation_MessageDatabase:
    members:
    - MessageDatabase
    policies:
    - QoSInfo:
        execution_time: 30 ms
        benchmark_platform: hp_cloud_services.2xl
    - dependencies: {}
tosca_definitions_version: tosca_simple_yaml_1_0_0_wd03
description: WebChat application
imports:
- tosca-normative-types:1.0.0.wd03-SNAPSHOT
topology_template:
  node_templates:
    WebChat-Module:
      type: seaclouds.nodes.webapp.tomcat.TomcatServer
      artifacts:
      - war: "http://search.maven.org/remotecontent?filepath=io/brooklyn/example/brooklyn-example-hello-world-sql-webapp/0.6.0/brooklyn-example-hello-world-sql-webapp-0.6.0.war"
        type: tosca.artifacts.File
      requirements:
      - endpoint: MessageDatabase
      - host: webservice_offering


    MessageDatabase:
      type: seaclouds.nodes.database.mysql.MySqlNode
      artifacts:
      - db_create: https://bit.ly/brooklyn-visitors-creation-script
        type: tosca.artifacts.File
      properties:
        mysql_version:
          constraints:
          - greater_or_equal: '5.0'
          - less_or_equal: '5.0'
      requirements:
      - host: My-DB-Compute

    MessageDatabase-Compute:
      type: seaclouds.Nodes.Compute
      properties:
        resource_type: compute
        hardwareId: i2.xlarge
        location: "aws:ec2"
        region: "eu-west-1"
        performance: 90
        availability: 0.99950
        country: Ireland
        city: Dublig
        cost: 1.001 USD/hour
        disk_size: 800
        num_disks: 1
        num_cpus: 4
        ram: 30.5
        disk_type: ssd

    webservice_offering:
      type: seaclouds.Nodes.Compute
      properties:
        resource_type: compute
        location: "hpcloud-compute"
        region: "region-b.geo-1"
        performance: 80
        availability: 0.99550
        country: EEUU
        city: Oregon
        cost: 1.101 USD/hour
        disk_size: 700
        num_disks: 2
        num_cpus: 4
        ram: 16.5
        disk_type: ssd


groups:
  operation_Chat:
    members:
    - WebChat-Module
    policies:
    - QoSInfo:
        execution_time: 50 ms
        benchmark_platform: hp_cloud_services.2xl
    - dependencies:
        operation_MessageDatabase: '2'
    - QoSRequirements:
        response_time:
          less_than: 2000.0 ms
        availability:
          greater_than: 0.998
        cost:
          less_or_equal: 200.0 euros_per_month
        workload:
          less_or_equal: 50.0 req_per_min
      - ExpectedQuality: {expectedWorkload: 50.0, expectedAvailability: 0.9994997551225, expectedCost: 190.8, expectedExecutionTime: 0.10079721294968995}

  operation_MessageDatabase:
    members:
    - MessageDatabase
    policies:
    - QoSInfo:
        execution_time: 30 ms
        benchmark_platform: hp_cloud_services.2xl
    - dependencies: {}
